content: **this pattern is free for a limited time only if you are interested in it download it now and store it in your library ** those mitts are meant to bring some warmth and comfort in your cold days with their extra long ribbing on the hand they can be worn in many ways with the ribbing totally folded over the hand to work on your computer or do anything that requires the use of your fingers with the ribbing partially folded over the fingers to warm your knuckles or totally unfolded to keep your fingers warm during your walks **sizes** to determine your size measure your palm without the thumb ans chose the closest size to your measurment * s to fit a hand circumference of 17 cm 6 3/4 inches * m to fit a hand cirumference of 19 cm 7 1/2 inches * l to fit a hand circumference of 21 cm 8 1/4 inches **level** easy **skills required** * knitting in the round * increases * decreases **needles** 2 25 mm or needles to achieve gauge **gauge ** 35 st / 48 row **yarn** sport yarn samples shown are knitted in edition 3 by schoppel wolle * light colors like a rainbow size m edition 3 by schoppel wolle colorway 2513 65g 195m * bold colors grennish yellow and bold pink size m edition 3 by schoppel wolle colorway 2296 65g 195m * blue size l edition 3 by schoppel wolle colorway 2362 72g 216m * grey brown size l edition 3 by schoppel wolle colorway 2362 70g 210m
